text.text: ☑️ TASK: In search of the blue spell essence
You have a Speculum Clypeus spell, but in order to use it, you have to get some blue essence.
Find it so you can steal some more magic!
You've had your past being around magic and you love it.
Even more you like the feeling of being blown by a spell, non-lethally, of course.
Absorb a spell targeted at you by using Speculum Clypeus spell.
